refnamediv.refpurpose: Specify the paths of the directories containing the Modelica class definition files

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This variable is used to specify where are the Modelica class definition files
If the user wants to define his own Modelica blocks, Modelica files describing the blocks must be indicated. The variable %MODELICA_USER_LIBS has to be declared as global before launching Xcos.

refsection.title: Example

listitem.para: getModelicaPath: get the Modelica directory path needed by Xcos diagram containing Modelica blocks
